column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: Police in Toul Kork and Daun Penh arrested 51 (2 female) drug suspects and 10 packs of drugs were seized. ------The crackdown took place on March 4
column5: near the train tracks in Village 16
column10: Phnom Penh. The arrests targeted both dealers and users.------15-17 motorbikes and several pieces of drug paraphernalia were taken as evidence.  The suspects are currently being detained and questioned for further proceedings. ------RASMEI
